level.heading: Cooperation from other agencies.
level.text: Agencies of the District of Columbia government shall cooperate in providing such information to the Commission as may be necessary to fulfill its statutory responsibilities.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Anatomical Gift Act, see § 7-1521.01 et seq.
Cemetery associations, regulations, construction of law, see § 43-131.
Human tissue banks, application of law, see § 7-1541.06.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-167
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-167, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-101.
